name: Mr There, Mr Back + Mr Collectables
name_original: Mr There, Mr Back + Mr Collectables
description:
This game was made for the Vimjam Game Jam and the theme was: There and Back again. The Focus was: Collectables

In this puzzle platformer game you control two characters who you can switch between, and try to push and pull a third character to the key and then back to the door. These characters are of course: Mr There, Mr Back and Mr Collectables.  

This was my first jam and i was 13 when i made this.
